name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Innovation**

Best Kept Secret 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 52 artists, spanning an incredible array of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw energy of post-punk and hardcore punk, the festival showcases the best of alternative, indie, and experimental sounds. Notable trends include a strong presence of electronic (6 acts), post-punk (5 acts), and hip-hop/rap (6 acts combined), reflecting the festival’s commitment to blending modern innovation with timeless musical expressions.

Diversity takes center stage at this year’s event, with artists hailing from 15 countries, including the USA, Netherlands, UK, Australia, and Ghana, among others. While male artists still dominate (22 acts), the lineup celebrates a mix of voices, including female (9), non-binary (1), and mixed-gender groups (9). Furthermore, 12 acts feature people of color, emphasizing the festival’s dedication to spotlighting underrepresented voices and global sounds, from Afrobeat and highlife to traditional South African music.

With an average artist rating of 7.2 and a strong focus on quality, Best Kept Secret 2026 promises an unforgettable experience for music lovers. The festival’s ability to unite emerging indie rockers, seasoned alternative acts, and groundbreaking electronic DJs highlights its role as a hub of creativity and inclusivity, offering something for every music taste while fostering a global and progressive community.
